menus.Value:
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-screen-desktop",
    Page: "interface",
    Title: "Interface"
)

    Icon: "icon-docs",

    Title: "Tables"
)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-briefcase",
    Page: "contracts",

)

    Page: "parameters",

)

    Icon: "icon-globe",
    Page: "languages",

)
MenuItem(
    Icon: "icon-cloud-upload",

    MenuItem(
        Icon: "icon-lock",
        Page: "vde",
        Title: "Dedicated Ecosystem"
    )
}

menus.Name: application_menu
menus.Value:
MenuItem(Title:$pages$, Page:application_pages, Params: "app_id=#app_id#", Icon:"icon icon-screen-desktop")
MenuItem(Title:$blocks$, Page:application_blocks, Params: "app_id=#app_id#", Icon:"fa fa-th")
MenuItem(Title:$menus$, Page:application_menus, Params: "app_id=#app_id#", Icon:"icon icon-menu")
MenuItem(Title:$smart_contracts$, Page:application_contracts, Params: "app_id=#app_id#", Icon:"icon icon-briefcase")
MenuItem(Title:$binary$, Page:application_binary, Params: "app_id=#app_id#", Icon:"fa fa-file")
MenuItem(Title:$params$, Page:application_params, Params: "app_id=#app_id#", Icon:"icon icon-settings")
